mapper.select: SELECT a.prj_id , a.version_number , a.step_number , a.step_lnk , a.step_description , a.lstc_file_path , a.rgst_dtm FROM process_step_info a WHERE a.prj_id = #{prj_id} AND a.version_number = #{version_number} AND a.step_number = #{step_number}

SELECT a.comm_id , a.prj_id , a.version_number , a.rgst_user_id , b.user_name , CASE WHEN b.user_level = 3 THEN '개발담당자' WHEN b.user_level = 2 THEN '보안담당자' WHEN b.user_level = 1 THEN '시스템관리자' ELSE '' END AS user_role , a.step_number , a.comment_description , a.rgst_dtm FROM process_comment a, user_info b WHERE a.prj_id = #{prj_id} AND a.version_number = #{version_number} AND a.step_number = #{step_number} AND a.rgst_user_id = b.user_id ORDER BY a.rgst_dtm ASC;
SELECT a.comm_id , a.file_path FROM process_comment_file a, process_comment b WHERE a.comm_id = b.comm_id
